title: Prison Sex (feat. Ms. Pat)
description:
Ms. Pat joins Jay and Dan the Bonfire and tells stories of sexual encounters in prison, which she learned from her corrections officer son.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
